snippet: The Republican Party of Armenia, a political party loyal to President Serge Sargsyan, won the most votes in its parliamentary election over the weekend.
abstract: Armenian political party loyal to Pres Serzh Sargsyan wins the most votes in a parliamentary election, result that tracks closely with pattern in other post-Soviet elections in which the parties in power tend to stay in power.
lead_paragraph: The Republican Party of Armenia, a political party loyal to President Serge Sargsyan, won the most votes in its parliamentary election over the weekend.

headline.seo: Armenian Parliamentary Elections Strengthen Ruling Party
headline.main: Supporters of President Gain in Armenian Election
headline.print_headline: Supporters of President Gain in Armenian Election
